nl_problem: There are three machines in a factory. Machine A can put caps on 12 bottles in 1 minute. Machine B can put caps to 2 fewer bottles than Machine A. Machine C can put caps to 5 more bottles than Machine B. How many bottles can those three machines put caps on in 10 minutes?
Jerry finds six hawk feathers and 17 times as many eagle feathers as hawk feathers. If he gives 10 feathers to his sister and sells half the remaining feathers, how many does he have left?
Ben wants to pick 56 sugar snap peas. At his current rate of picking, all will be picked in seven minutes. How long, in minutes, would it take Ben to pick 72 sugar snap peas?

Nora is selling muffins to raise 120 for an upcoming school trip. She has packaged the muffins in cases. Each case has three packs of muffins. Each pack has four muffins. If she prices each muffin at two dollars, how many cases of muffins must she sell to raise enough money for the trip?
An investment bank gives 10 percent interest at the end of every month. How much money in total will you have, including interest, at the end of 2 months if you invest 300?
Let $p4$, $q$, and $r$ be constants, one solution to the equation $(x-p)(x-q) = (r-p)(r-q)$ is $x=r$, find the other solution in terms of $p$, $q$, and $r$.
Find the greatest common factor of 180 and 168.
Marcus is half of Leoâ€™s age and five years younger than Deanna. Deanna is 26. How old is Leo?

It takes 30 minutes to make pizza dough and another 30 minutes in the oven for the pizza to cook. If one batch of pizza dough can make 3 pizzas but the oven can only fit 2 pizzas at a time, how many hours would it take for Camilla to finish making 12 pizzas?
